name: PET ROCK (Lev1)
description:
A VERY simplistic virtual-pet game made in under a day.

PET ROCK is a game where you must take care of your virtual pet rock. You must keep it fed with burgers, keep it happy with cookies, and keep it clean with showers. This is one of the most accurate pet rock simulations to date.

controls:
Left - A key, left arrow key, or 4 on the number pad.
Right - D key, right arrow key, or 6 on the number pad.
Select - Space bar, or 5 on the number pad.
